title: Five-Star Queenstown Suite Elegance with Daily Breakfast & NZ$150 Dining Credit
description:
Moments from the glistening shores of crystal-clear Lake Wakatipu and surrounded by award-winning restaurants and bars, this boutique hideaway is so intimate that most locals don’t even know it’s there. Hidden down Church Lane, and home to just 10 spacious luxury suites, this five-star hotel offers true privacy in the heart of Queenstown, New Zealand’s adventure capital.

Sink into designer comfort in your private suite, featuring elegant furnishings and a private balcony for enjoying the crisp Queenstown air. Cosy up in front of the stone fireplace or head out to discover the city’s top dining. As for adventure, Skyline Queenstown gondola is within a 12-minute walk and the lift line of Coronet Peak and The Remarkables is a 40 minute drive away.

title: Five-Star Lake Wakatipu Hilton Retreat for Four Guests with Daily Breakfast
description: Indulge in a blend of signature Hilton luxury, upscale apartment living and awe-inspiring natural beauty on the shores of Lake Wakatipu at Hilton Queenstown Resort & Spa. Whether you're a thrill-seeker visiting the adventure capital of the world, a wine-lover sampling the region's unique flavours, or simply drawn to the area's incredible alpine scenery, Queenstown is the perfect destination for travellers of all persuasions. Leave the world behind and relax in a secluded Two-Bedroom Lakeview Residence, perfect for an escape with friends or family with four guests included.
offer_address: 79 Peninsula Road, Kawarau Village, Queenstown, 9300 New Zealand

vendor_name: The Dairy Private Hotel by Naumi Hotels
title: Boutique Queenstown Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Discover an ultra-cool alchemy of rustic charm, bold design and alpine style at The Dairy Private Hotel by Naumi Hotels - a boutique retreat that beats in the heart of Queenstown. Set against a mountainous backdrop, this former 1920s corner store - locally known as a dairy and reimagined as a luxe abode - features a collection of uniquely styled rooms with botanical themed wallpaper by luxury British interiors brand House of Hackney. Whether you choose to soak in uninterrupted vistas of The Remarkables from the hotel's outdoor hot tub or prefer to indulge your inner explorer in New Zealand's adventure capital, this sensational hotel invites you to craft your dream Queenstown itinerary.

**Your handpicked inclusions (select packages):**

- Prepare for a day in Queenstown with a daily continental breakfast of fresh fruit, pastries and more
- Enjoy a nightly drinks hour (5pm to 6pm) with a selection of handpicked local wines
- Let yourself truly unwind with a one-hour reserved jacuzzi session for two
- Relax until the very last moment with a guaranteed 1pm late checkout

**Travelling with friends or family?** Upgrade to the expansive Four-Bedroom Apartment for up to eight guests and enjoy one breakfast basket for your group, two bottles of premium New Zealand wine, free parking and 2pm early check-in, subject to availability.
location_description: The Dairy Private Hotel by Naumi Hotels

title: Elegant Queenstown Fireplace Suites with NZ$150 Dining Credit, Daily Breakfast & Complimentary Cheese Board with Wine
description:
Moments from the glistening shores of crystal-clear Lake Wakatipu is a boutique five-star hideaway, so intimate even locals are still discovering it. The Spire Hotel Queenstown is hidden away down charming Church Lane and home to just 10 spacious luxury suites, this award-winning hotel invites you to experience true privacy in the heart of Queenstown, New Zealand's adventure capital. Sink into the calm of designer comfort in your private suite, featuring elegant furnishings and a private balcony inviting you to inhale the crisp Queenstown air.

Cosy up in front of the stone-clad fireplace or head out to discover some of the city’s top dining right at your doorstep. As for adventure, it doesn’t get much better than this: Skyline Queenstown Gondola is within a 10-minute walk and the lift line of Coronet Peak and The Remarkables are reachable in less than a 40 minutes drive.

title: Five-Star Apartment Stay in Queenstown with Stunning Lake and Mountain Views
description: Experience a perfect Queenstown location with stunning views of Lake Wakatipu and the surrounding mountains at Swiss Belsuites Pounamu Queenstown. Stay in a spacious, upgraded Lake View One Bedroom Suite and enjoy uninterrupted views and the convenience of a self-contained apartment. Includes a daily breakfast hamper for two, two days’ bike hire for exploring your surroundings and a guaranteed late 2pm checkout.

title: BEST OF 2019: Five-Star Apartment Stay in Queenstown with Stunning Lake and Mountain Views
description: Experience a perfect Queenstown location with stunning views of Lake Wakatipu and the surrounding mountains at Swiss Belsuites Pounamu Queenstown. Stay in a spacious, upgraded Lake View One Bedroom Suite and enjoy uninterrupted views and the convenience of a self-contained apartment. title: Charming Queenstown Stay Overlooking Coronet Peak with Daily Breakfast
description:
Offering magical views over frosted, snowy peaks and one of New Zealand’s most beautiful lakes, Manata Lodge invites you in with countryside hospitality, style and warmth. Perched amid extensive gardens and fruit vineyards, this property is enviably located with vistas over Coronet Peak and The Remarkables, a short drive from Queenstown, Arrowtown and the exquisite Gibbston Valley. Indulge with a daily breakfast hamper delivered to the comfort of your Studio Apartment and a one-time wine and cheese platter to enjoy.

⏱**Buy now, choose dates later**: Secure this deal now and choose your travel dates when you're ready (see Fine Print for details).
offer_address: 111A Tucker Beach Road, Queenstown OTG 9371 New Zealand

title: Elegant Five-Star Luxury in the Heart of Queenstown
description: Experience the beauty of New Zealand staying at The Spire Hotel Queenstown, located in the heart of the city. With just ten chic suites, this boutique property offers guests a tranquil place to unwind within easy reach of Queenstown's main attractions. Enjoy five days/four nights in a Suite with daily à la carte breakfasts, welcome drinks, nightly cocktails, a three-course dining experience, NZ$150 hotel credit and more for only $999 per person (twin share), valued up to $6,163.
location_description: The Spire Hotel Queenstown - DO NOT USE

title: New Zealand: 7-Night Queenstown Ski Adventure with Daily Breakfast & 5-Day Lift Pass
description:
Set off on an unforgettable alpine adventure to Queenstown's spectacular Coronet Peak and The Remarkables with this incredible seven-night New Zealand ski package. With its sweeping mountain ranges, mammoth lakes that sparkle liquid silver and grand swathes of translucent ice, Queenstown has to be one of the most naturally beautiful places on the planet. Enjoy ample time to hit the slopes with a five-day lift pass and experience the thrill of New Zealand's adventure capital. 

Enjoy seven nights at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Queenstown, an IHG Hotel, located just 10 minutes from Queenstown Airport and a short walk from the buzzing waterfront. This modern hotel provides easy access to the area's best sights, including Lake Hayes, Arrowtown, Lake Wakatipu and Jack's Point Golf Course. Your package also includes daily breakfast, a five-day early bird mountain lift pass to use across The Remarkables and Coronet Peak, daily roundtrip transfers between your hotel and the mountain base, plus airport transfers.
offer_address: Cnr Stanley, Sydney Street, And, Queenstown 9300, New Zealand

title: Romantic Queenstown Escape Overlooking Lake Wakatipu with Daily Breakfast
description:
The ‘adventure capital of the world’ is a natural masterpiece graced with otherworldly wonders, breathtaking snow-capped peaks that stretch across the skyline, sparkling turquoise lakes and densely forested valleys - and a tranquil stay at Mercure Queenstown Resort is the best way to immerse yourself in the beauty that surrounds.

Within moments of arriving, you’ll be immediately captivated by the dramatic views over Lake Wakatipu and The Remarkables mountain range. The superb location makes it easy to split your time between adrenaline-filled adventures and switching into relaxation mode for a slower pace. Depending on the season, you can relax by the pool, spend time in the sauna or gym, sip on a cocktail at the Lounge Bar and enjoy alpine views and delicious modern fare at Rises Restaurant. A five-minute drive takes you to Queenstown’s bustling centre, gateway to nearby ski resorts, hiking trails and more.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Enjoy a delightful daily buffet breakfast for two at Rises Restaurant
- Arrive to a welcome drink for two served in the lobby
- Make the moment last longer with guaranteed 1pm late checkout
- Stay connected with high-speed internet access

**Superior Lake View Upgrade**: Enjoy a stay you'll remember forever when you upgrade to a Superior Lake View room with unbeatable vistas across Lake Wakatipu and The Remarkables.
offer_address: Sainsbury Road Fernhill, Private Bag, 50071, Queenstown 9300, New Zealand

title: Five-Star Queenstown Studio Escape Overlooking Lake Wakatipu & The Remarkables
description:
Strike the perfect balance between upscale apartment living, awe-inspiring natural beauty and heart-pumping adventure with a stay at the five-star Swiss-Belsuites Pounamu, Queenstown. Soak up serene views over Lake Wakatipu and the magnificent Remarkables mountain range, with the heart of Queenstown just a 15-minute stroll away.

Whether you’re in it for the iconic hiking trails, the adrenaline-fuelled bungy jumps, vineyards or awe-inspiring views, Queenstown will enrapture you with its thriving activity hub, dynamic downtown restaurant scene and otherworldly natural wonders. Enjoy the flexibility of a self-catering escape, dining in the comfort of your studio or suite, or dip your toe into Queenstown's exciting culinary scene: this is your escape, your way.

vendor_name: The Central Private Hotel by Naumi Hotels
title: Boutique Queenstown Designer Luxury with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Free-Flow Drinks
description:
Immerse yourself in a whimsical wonderland in the heart of vibrant Queenstown at The Central Private Hotel by Naumi Hotels. This self-rated boutique sanctuary uses quirky design and luxe facilities to create a high-end playground for grown-ups (guests must be 12+ to stay), with complimentary drinks served in a cosy shared lounge every evening.

Wake refreshed from a night spent in your spacious, designer room, ready for action-packed days exploring Queenstown. The hotel is a short walk from adrenaline-filled adventure, as well as a plethora of dining and entertainment venues. Those seeking a gentler experience can hit the kilometres of hiking and biking trails in the surrounding picturesque mountains or sit in the soothing steam of the Onsen Hot Pools.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Fuel yourself for a day exploring Queenstown with daily continental breakfast
- Arrive to a welcome bottle of wine to enjoy in your stylish room
- Mix things up with one complimentary gin tasting session for two
- Relax with a romantic sauna experience and infused bath ritual
- Head to the guest lounge for daily free-flow drinks hour between 5pm and 6pm
- Enjoy the convenience of complimentary parking for one vehicle
- Stay connected with complimentary Wi-Fi

**Oasis Upgrade:** Experience some of Queenstown's most spacious accommodation when you upgrade to an Oasis room, nestled among the surrounding treetops.

**KJet Ride Upgrade:** Make your Queenstown escape one to remember by upgrading to a package with a 60-minute jet boat ride with KJet. See the Highlights and Fine Print for more info.

**This deal has NO peak surcharges:** Travel any time for the same great price.
location_description: The Central Private Hotel by Naumi Hotels

title: Lakeside Queenstown Heritage Escape with Daily Breakfast, NZ$150 Dining Credit & Nightly Drink
description:
Step into a world of timeless elegance, poised on the shores of Lake Wakatipu. For more than 160 years, Eichardt's Private Hotel has stood as one of Queenstown's most distinguished addresses, a heritage retreat where historic charm meets contemporary luxury. Every corner of this boutique retreat has been designed to maximise breathtaking alpine views - whether you're sipping coffee on a private balcony or cosied up by the fireplace in your luxurious suite.

After days spent exploring Queenstown's boutique galleries, scenic walking trails or world-class ski resorts, retreat to the hotel for a feast at The Grille, where locally sourced ingredients shine in a bistro-style menu. A nightcap at Eichardt's Bar is the perfect way to end a day in Queenstown.

title: Boutique Queenstown Villas with Lake Wakatipu Views, Daily Breakfast, Afternoon Tea & Nightly Drinks
description:
Wake up to sweeping lake and mountain views at this boutique Queenstown retreat. Perched atop a hillside amid native bush, this exclusive hideaway offers seclusion just five minutes from the heart of New Zealand’s adventure capital.

Soak in uninterrupted views from the bathtub, perfectly placed in a bay window to bring the beauty of the outdoors inside. Watch the iconic century-old TSS Earnslaw glide through the lake's water, savour locally-sourced ingredients for breakfast in the Main Lodge and explore Queenstown’s adrenaline-filled attractions or hike the surrounding trails. As evening falls, return to the lodge for a glass of New Zealand wine by the fire, soaking in the serenity of this lakeside sanctuary.
offer_address: 23 MacKinnon Terrace, Sunshine Bay, Queenstown 9300, New Zealand

title: Five-Star Queenstown Studio Stay near Lake Wakatipu & The Remarkables
description:
Strike the perfect balance between upscale apartment living, awe-inspiring natural beauty and iconic heart-pumping adventure with a stay at the high-end Swiss-Belsuites Pounamu Queenstown. Discover everything this incredible destination has to offer while soaking up serene views over Lake Wakatipu and the magnificent The Remarkables mountain range. Experience five-star luxury staying in an Alpine Studio just a short walk from the town with guaranteed 2pm late checkout. Unearth the beauty and adventure at your doorstep with two days of included bike hire per person, a daily breakfast hamper of fresh bread, muesli, fruits and yoghurt and an Experience Passport filled with local offers and discounts.

**Travelling with Family?** Up to four people may stay when you upgrade to the Two-Bedroom Suite.

title: High-End Queenstown Boutique Spa Suites with NZ$150 Dining Credit, Daily Breakfast, Champagne & Luxury Transfers
description:
Soak in spectacular vistas of the shimmering Lake Wakatipu while cosying up by your private gas fireplace, or relax and rejuvenate in your bubbling terrace spa, all from the comfort of one of just eight intimate suites at The Carlin Boutique Hotel in Queenstown. Offering new levels of opulence, this hillside refuge - one of the newest members of the exclusive Small Luxury Hotels of the World - promises to take your stay to new heights with, in the hotel's own words, better than five-star service. Gastronomic delights await at the contemporary ORO restaurant, where chefs trained in Michelin-starred restaurants transform fresh local produce into a fine-dining feast. For an added touch of extravagance, fly in from anywhere in Australasia on a chartered 12-seat private jet, for a unique start to your stay (surcharges apply).

There's a multitude of ways to explore the beauty of Queenstown, with an abundance of nature trails, gourmet dining destinations, and plenty of adrenaline-pumping activities. Embark on a thrilling adventure down steep slopes or test your limits with a bungee jump, zipline, or even a skydive from 15,000ft above the Wakatipu Basin. After pushing yourself to your limits, reward yourself with a glass of wine and a deluxe dinner overlooking the magnificent Lake Wakatipu.

title: Boutique Winery Escape Amidst New Zealand's Spectacular Scenery
description: Soak up New Zealand’s impressive natural scenery and discover the country’s wines and sublime local produce with a boutique stay at Kinross Cottages, a serene property surrounded by vineyards located just 25-minutes outside Queenstown. Boasting an onsite bistro and cellar door, Kinross Cottages is the ideal destination for food and wine lovers, with daily breakfast, nightly wine tasting, NZ$40 food and drinks credit for the bistro and a bottle of Kinross wine to take home with you all included.

title: Queenstown Escape near Coronet Peak Ski Fields with Daily Dining Credit
description:
Escape to Queenstown's slopes and surround yourself with New Zealand's stunning natural beauty at the family-friendly Swiss-Belresort Coronet Peak, located just 10 minutes from the heart of the city and 20 minutes from Coronet Peak ski fields.

Each spacious, open-plan room features cosy bedding, heating and electric blankets for those cool alpine nights, while the resort boasts Queenstown’s only full-size seven-lane tenpin bowling and entertainment centre - including Timezone arcade games, pool tables, air hockey and more. After fun-filled days of skiing or discovering this adventure playground's breathtaking array of outdoor pursuits, retreat to the resort's chalet-style Swiss-Cafe™ Restaurant and Bar for a locally-sourced feast, or catch the resort's complimentary shuttle into town to discover Queenstown's world-class dining scene, home to the acclaimed Fergburger and Botswana Butchery.
offer_address: 161 Arthurs Point Road, Arthurs Point 9371, Queenstown, New Zealand

title: Five-Star Lake Wakatipu Hilton Retreat with Daily Breakfast
description:
Indulge in a blend of signature Hilton luxury, upscale suite and apartment living and awe-inspiring natural beauty on the shores of Lake Wakatipu at Hilton Queenstown Resort & Spa. Ideally situated on the shores of the Frankton Arm with breathtaking lake views, this luxurious sanctuary is the perfect launchpad for exploring the city, which is easily reachable by car or a short, picturesque water taxi ride.

Whether you're a thrill-seeker visiting the adventure capital of the world, a wine-lover sampling the region's unique flavours, or simply drawn to the area's incredible alpine scenery, Queenstown is the perfect destination for travellers of all persuasions - and there's simply no better place to take it all in that the five-star Hilton Queenstown Resort & Spa. With its lavish full-service spa, indoor pool with sauna, casual tipples at Stacks Pub, expert chefs preparing signature dishes in Wakatipu Grill, as well as world-class service, this resort ensures a stay you'll never forget.
offer_address: 79 Peninsula Road, Kawarau Village, Queenstown, 9300 New Zealand

title: Award-Winning Queenstown Boutique Spa Suites with NZ$150 Dining Credit, Daily Breakfast, Champagne & Luxury Transfers
description:
Soak in spectacular vistas of the shimmering Lake Wakatipu while cosying up in fireside comfort in one of just eight intimate suites at Queenstown's award-winning five-star The Carlin Boutique Hotel. Offering new levels of opulence, this hillside refuge - a member of the exclusive Small Luxury Hotels of the World - promises to take your stay to new heights with top-notch service. Gastronomic delights await at the contemporary ORO restaurant, where chefs trained in Michelin-starred restaurants transform fresh local produce into a fine-dining feast.

Discover an abundance of nature trails, gourmet dining destinations, and plenty of adrenaline-pumping activities in the world's adventure capital. After pushing yourself to your limits, reward yourself with a glass of wine and a deluxe dinner overlooking the magnificent Lake Wakatipu.
offer_address: 43 Hallenstein Street, Queenstown, Otago 9300, New Zealand

title: Romantic Vineyard Cottages near Queenstown with Daily Breakfast & Wine Tasting
description:
Embrace Central Otago's beautiful natural scenery and discover New Zealand's finest wines with a stay at Kinross, a boutique property set amid the lush vineyards just 30 minutes from Queenstown. A luxurious, private haven of 14 generously sized rooms, Kinross is ideally located for leaving the hustle and bustle behind as you soak up the serenity of this picturesque part of the world.

Enjoy outstanding service as days are spent exploring the lush grounds, gardens and vineyards, sampling gourmet food and fine wines or taking in the historic landscapes. This working vineyard also features a cellar door, bistro and communal pétanque, as well as ample car parking.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Indulge in a delicious daily cooked breakfast with à la carte options and barista-made tea or coffee
- Rediscover tranquility with a 45-minute hot tub experience for two
- Enjoy a one-time wine tasting for two
- Pop open a bottle of Kinross sparkling wine in-cottage on arrival
- Celebrate your escape with a welcome glass of wine each on arrival
- Arrive ready for your escape with a guaranteed 1pm early check-in
- Enjoy a well-deserved sleep-in with guaranteed 11am late checkout
- Stay connected with complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi

**Upgrades Available:** Make your stay extra special by upgrading to a cottage overlooking the luscious vineyards. See individual packages for details.

title: Boutique Lakeside Queenstown Escape with Daily Breakfast & Outdoor Hot Tub Experience
description:
Fall in love with New Zealand’s magnificent mountains and shimmering glacial lakes from the comfort of Hidden Lodge Queenstown. Crafted to offer the right amount of tranquility while placing you within close proximity to town, this is the South Island escape you’ve been dreaming of.

Embrace the serenity of this boutique hotel, featuring just four suites boasting unrivalled views of the surrounding landscape. Recharge within your cosy abode or make use of the communal lounge, dining area, outdoor courtyard or gardens before unearthing the wonders of Queenstown. While many visitors are drawn to the ‘adventure capital of the world' in search of thrilling experiences, Queenstown has something for everyone - world-renowned wineries and restaurants, scenery featured in many Hollywood blockbusters and some of the friendliest locals in the Southern Hemisphere.
offer_address: 28 Evergreen Place, Queenstown Queenstown OTA 9300 New Zealand

title: Five-Star QT Luxury Overlooking Lake Wakatipu with Daily Breakfast
description:
Alpine luxury sitting pretty amid crystal-clear Lake Wakatipu and the Southern Alps sets the scene for our best Queenstown deal ever at QT Queenstown. Emulating sleek Scandinavian design with breathtaking views of Coronet Peak and The Remarkables, this funky five-star waterfront property is the ultimate après-ski launchpad to discover New Zealand's adrenaline-fuelled South Island.

Enjoy daily breakfast, a daily beer, wine or soft drink per person at Reds Bar, 20% off additional food and drinks and a guaranteed 2pm late checkout.

Plus, one child (aged 11 years and under) stays free with daily breakfast and a daily soft drink.

title: Boutique New Zealand Vineyard Escape with Nightly Wine-Tasting Masterclass
description: Exchange the hustle and bustle of the city for a glass of fine, New Zealand wine in the picturesque Gibbston region at the five-star, award-winning Kinross Cottages. With an onsite cellar door, bistro with a focus on fresh, local produce and a serene setting of lush vineyards just 25 minutes from Queenstown, this is the ultimate gourmet retreat fit for couples and families alike. Soak up the impressive views and savour delicious inclusions such as daily breakfast, a nightly masterclass-style wine tasting, an impressive NZ$70 food and drink credit to use at the on-site bistro and a welcome bottle of Kinross wine to take home with you.

title: Five-Star Boutique Queenstown Escape with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Whatever reason draws you to New Zealand’s adventure capital - from the atmospheric restaurants and bars to endless outdoor pursuits - a five-star stay at Queenstown Park Boutique Hotel is your perfect springboard into the region’s natural wonders. Enjoy the best of both worlds thanks to the property’s unrivalled location, just moments from the vibrant town centre and yet perfectly placed to take in the breathtaking alpine views.

Find it all at your fingertips with exceptional cafés and nightlife on the shores of Lake Wakatipu, or travel further afield with an exhilarating jet boat ride, a day of mountain hiking or skiing, or sipping on a local drop at one of the region's award-winning cellars.

After a day of exhilaration, exploration or slow-paced relaxation, return to the comfort of this 22-room oasis, set against a backdrop of the Skyline Gondola or The Remarkables, and settle into the comforts of the exclusive guest lounge, where you'll be wined each and every night with pre-dinner drinks, canapés and the warmth of the cosy fireplace.

title: Five-Star Romantic Queenstown Lakefront Escape with Daily Breakfast & Cheeseboard with Wine
description:
Take in the pure, unadulterated beauty of Queenstown with a heavenly stay at the five-star Stoneridge Estate, a stunning setting perfect for a romantic escape. Nestled among sprawling gardens and rows of grapevines on the tranquil shores of Lake Hayes, Stoneridge Estate is home to three sublime properties - the Retreat, the Lodge and the Cottage. While they differ slightly in style and design, each has been thoughtfully crafted to offer views of the sparkling lake, verdant vines and majestic mountains that stretch as far as the eye can see. While the hours away soaking in the outdoor hot tub, curl up by the cosy fire with a glass of wine in hand, relax on the expansive outdoor terrace or take the plunge and dive into the expansive infinity pool that boasts panoramic views of the awe-inspiring landscape.

Then, when you're ready to lure yourself away from your luxurious abode, the ‘adventure capital of the world’, Queenstown, awaits: take your pick of adrenaline-filled experiences, renowned vineyards, culinary delights and more, ready to be explored at your own pace. 

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Start your day with a sumptuous à la carte and continental breakfast for two with barista-made coffee
- Round out each day with a daily cheese board filled with locally sourced goods and one glass of wine from the estate
- Toast your stay with two complimentary glasses of bubbles in the private hot tub
- Treat yourself to a luxurious in-room spa treatment with a 15% discount on couples' massages
- Stay hydrated with complimentary soft drinks, juice and water from the in-room minibar
- Enjoy complimentary airport transfers on request
- Maximise every moment of your blissful escape with guaranteed 12pm late checkout

**Make your stay extra special:** Experience boutique luxury at its finest when you upgrade to the Retreat for a relaxed stay with exceptional views.
offer_address: 756 Lake Hayes-Arrow Junction Highway RD 1, Frankton, Queenstown 9371, New Zealand

title: Award-Winning Queenstown Boutique Spa Suites with NZ$150 Dining Credit, Daily Breakfast, Champagne & Luxury Transfers
description: Soak in spectacular vistas of the shimmering Lake Wakatipu while cosying up in fireside comfort in one of just eight intimate suites at Queenstown's award-winning, five-star The Carlin Boutique Hotel. Offering dazzling new heights of opulence, this hillside refuge - a member of the exclusive Small Luxury Hotels of the World collection - promises to take your stay to new heights with top-notch service. Gastronomic delights await at the contemporary ORO restaurant, where expert chefs transform fresh local produce into a fine-dining feast. Discover an abundance of natural wonder - and plenty of adrenaline-pumping activities - in Queenstown, the world's adventure capital, before rewarding yourself with a glass of wine and a deluxe dinner overlooking the magnificent Lake Wakatipu.
offer_address: 43 Hallenstein Street, Queenstown, Otago 9300, New Zealand

title: Five-Star Queenstown Retreat Overlooking Lake Wakatipu & The Remarkables
description:
Strike the perfect balance between upscale apartment living, awe-inspiring natural beauty and heart-pumping adventure with a stay at the five-star Swiss-Belsuites Pounamu, Queenstown. Discover everything this incredible destination has to offer while soaking up serene views over Lake Wakatipu and the magnificent Remarkables mountain range.

Experience high-end luxury and unearth the adventure at your doorstep with a daily breakfast hamper of fresh bread, muesli, fruits and yoghurt, daily bike hire per person and a guaranteed 2pm late checkout

**Travelling with friends or family?** Upgrade to a Lake View Two Bedroom Suite for four.

title: Five-Star Heritage Queenstown Lakefront Escape
description:
Embrace easy-going provincial elegance and 19th-century Queenstown grandeur at Eichardt’s Private Hotel, beautifully perched on the shores of sparkling Lake Wakatipu. Architecturally crafted with warm, confident strokes and flawless symmetry, married seamlessly with a marvellous mix of distinctive antiques, bespoke art and luxurious furnishings, this historic lakeside retreat is the perfect spot for an indulgent and intimate escape. Its charming suites, apartments and penthouse redefine stylish and relaxed sophistication, which reflects upon traditional luxury with exceptional comfort, generous space and inspired modernity. With all rooms either overlooking the shores of Lake Wakatipu or The Remarkables mountain range, the iconic Eichardt's Private Hotel tops pure indulgence.

Take advantage of second-to-none service and an outstanding array of facilities, including private treatments and therapies at Vault Spa, delicious delicacies in The Grille by Eichardt's and signature cocktails in Eichardt's Bar - a Queenstown icon since 1867. Should the sun be shining, the outdoor lakeside beach is the perfect place to relax, as is Queenstown's nearby café and restaurant precinct. There’s also much more to explore further afield - from bungee jumping off Kawarau Bridge and trekking the Ben Lomond trail to climbing Queenstown Hill and visiting the vine-laced countryside of nearby Gibbston Valley, brimming with Otago cellar doors.

title: Family-Friendly Queenstown Escape Overlooking Lake Wakatipu & The Remarkables
description: Treat the family to an unforgettable New Zealand stay at Holiday Inn Queenstown Frankton Road, an IHG Hotel, overlooking Lake Wakatipu. A 30-minute drive from the snow-capped Coronet Peak and The Remarkables, this fabulously located hotel is within close distance of famed ski fields, one of Queenstown's best viewpoints, the Skyline Queenstown gondola and more. After a long day of exploring, dine at the onsite Lake View Restaurant or pamper yourself at the spa and sauna, in preparation for a restful night.
location_description: Holiday Inn Queenstown Frankton Road, an IHG Hotel

title: Serene Queenstown Escape on Lake Wakatipu with Tennis Court
description:
Delve into Queenstown's action-packed adventure scene with an idyllic stay at this waterfront retreat, perched on the shores of Lake Wakatipu and with stunning views of The Remarkables mountains. Take advantage of your hotel's strategic location, offering easy access to the region's adrenaline-fuelled activities, from white-water rafting to bungee jumping and experience the 'Adventure Capital of the World' up close.

Spend your days admiring the beautiful lake and mountain vistas from your apartment's private balcony or practise your serve at the hotel's tennis court. Take a leisurely stroll along the lake or head into the centre of Queenstown, teeming with exciting shopping, restaurants and bars.

title: Queenstown Stylish Lakeside Apartment-Style Retreat Overlooking the Remarkables
description: Between Lake Wakatipu’s shimmering waters and the high ranges of the Remarkables lies Oaks Queenstown Shores Resort, the perfect place to discover what makes the South Island’s adventure capital so extraordinary. After a day discovering some of the best ski fields in the world or Queenstown’s smorgasbord of heart-thumping experiences, the resort offers the perfect retreat - watch the sun set behind glass-like waters and embrace the mountainside serenity.

title: Matakauri Lodge Ultra Lux 23
description: x
offer_address: Farrycroft Row, 569 Glenorchy Road, Queenstown 9348, New Zealand

title: Queenstown French-Inspired Alpine Opulence near Lake Wakatipu with Four Restaurants & Bars
description:
Immerse yourself in five-star glamour, where French elegance meets the rugged beauty of New Zealand’s adventure capital. On the doorstep of the town centre, with views of Lake Wakatipu and The Remarkables mountain range, this luxurious retreat is the ultimate base for exploring Queenstown in style.

Start your day with a Parisian-style breakfast at Left Bank Bistro before diving into Queenstown’s adrenaline-fuelled attractions, from the Shotover River to Kiwi Park and Bob’s Peak. Unwind in style with cocktails at the chic Ke Salon Rouge, local produce at Le Petit Salon or premium steaks and seafood at Jervois Steakhouse.

title: Scenic Queenstown Haven with Lake Wakatipu Views
description: Choose breathtaking views and superior comfort with a stay just minutes from Queenstown’s active town centre. The resort offers breathtaking views of the Remarkables across the idyllic Lake Wakatipu. Take a dip in the hotel spa or book into the sauna after days spent exploring your scenic surrounds. From flavourful local dining to the city’s signature nightlife, plus a plethora of outdoor activities to keep you busy from sun-up to sundown, Queenstown is at your fingertips.
offer_address: 21 Sainsbury Road, Fernhill, Queenstown 9300, New Zealand

title: Stylish Queenstown Stay with Stunning Landscape Views
description: Immerse yourself in New Zealand’s flawless landscape at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Queenstown, an IHG Hotel. Shouldered by stunning mountain ranges and vibrant greenery, this hotel’s central location is close to filming spots of The Lord of the Rings, a 1960’s gold rush town and plenty of picturesque hiking trails. After a full day of adventure come back to your base and indulge in a tasty dinner at the hotel restaurant and find a cosy spot next to the fireplace with a hearty local wine.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express and Suites Queenstown, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Cnr Stanley and Sydney Street, Queenstown 9300, New Zealand

title: Contemporary Queenstown Self-Contained Cottages Overlooking Lake Hayes with Fire Pit & Ski Storage
description: Indulge in a moment of tranquility at The Cottages at Lake Hayes, nestled in the hinterlands just a short drive from Queenstown. This retreat, surrounded by the beauty of Lake Hayes and Coronet Peak, offers a serene escape. Spend days on the ski slopes, exploring the nearby historic Arrowtown, savouring wines at Amisfield Winery, or dining at the famed Amisfield Bistro. As evening falls, retreat to your private cottage, where floor-to-ceiling windows frame the breathtaking alpine vistas.
offer_address: 4 Marshall Avenue, Threepwood, Lake Hayes 9371, New Zealand

title: Scenic Queenstown Escape Overlooking Lake Wakatipu & The Remarkables with Onsite Restaurant & Bar
description:
Experience the allure of Queenstown with a stay at the luxurious Hotel St Moritz Queenstown - MGallery Collection in the heart of New Zealand's adventure capital. Perfectly situated, this boutique retreat offers breathtaking views of Lake Wakatipu and The Remarkables mountain range. Stay just a short stroll from the city's vibrant dining and shopping scene, and a drive from all four of Queenstown's ski fields and popular attractions including the Shotover Jet.

Sumptuous dining awaits at the award-winning Lombardi Restaurant, where you can savour local flavours while admiring panoramic lake, mountain and town views. After a day of exploring, retreat to the peaceful Hot Tub Garden to unwind and take in your spectacular surroundings, or enjoy a workout at the onsite fitness centre.
location_description: Hotel St Moritz Queenstown - MGallery Collection

title: QT Queenstown Designer Luxury Overlooking Lake Wakatipu
description:
Sitting proudly on the edge of magical Lake Wakatipu, QT Queenstown invites you to join the lift line of Coronet Peak and The Remarkables before returning to the welcome comforts of après-ski. Experience alpine sophistication and indulgence at this design-forward haven, before stepping out to explore the array of attractions within a short drive - from a shopping spree in the city centre to world-class winter sports, adrenaline-fuelled adventures and romantic walks amid award-winning vineyards.

After a day of sightseeing, return to the hotel’s foyer, where a stylish 'floating' fireplace suspended from the ceiling and sweeping lakeside views will lull you into utter relaxation. Then, grab a bite overlooking the mountains at Bazaar, or settle into one of the comfortable loungers across the hallway at Reds. For those still active, enjoy a soak in the heated swimming pool or work out at the onsite gym.

title: Peppers Queenstown Escape Overlooking Lake Wakatipu & The Remarkables with Onsite Restaurant
description: Experience the allure of New Zealand's adventure capital with a stay set between Lake Wakatipu’s shimmering waters and the high ranges of The Remarkables. Savour the flavours of Queenstown's vibrant dining scene, just a short stroll away, or relish in the excitement of your proximity to world-class skiing, bungee jumping and white-water rafting. Return to your central haven and refuel at the onsite Galley Restaurant and Bar.
offer_address: 34 Lake Esplanade, Queenstown, Otago 9300, New Zealand

title: Stylish Queenstown Escape Overlooking Lake Wakatipu & The Remarkables
description: Find the perfect balance between modern comforts, awe-inspiring natural beauty and heart-pumping adventure with a stay at Oaks Queenstown Club Suites. Soak up serene views over Lake Wakatipu and the magnificent Remarkables mountain range from your comfortable accommodation, with the heart of Queenstown just a 20-minute stroll away. Whether you’re in it for the iconic hiking trails, the adrenaline-fuelled bungy jumps, unforgettable vineyards or breathtaking views, Queenstown will capture you with its bustling streets, dynamic downtown restaurant scene and otherworldly natural wonders. Meanwhile, enjoy the flexibility of a self-catering escape, a modern fitness centre and a sauna all onsite.
offer_address: 171-179 Frankton Rd, Queenstown STH 9300, New Zealand

title: Remarkable Five-Star Queenstown Escape on Shores of Lake Wakatipu with Private Beach
description: The spellbinding natural wonders of Queenstown are best enjoyed from The Rees Hotel, Luxury Apartments and Lakeside Residences, thanks to its unique position along the shores of Lake Wakatipu. Spend days exploring the private beach, jetting off on watersport activities via the private wharf, browsing rare books at the onsite library, tasting fine Central Otago wines at the Bordeau Wine Lounge, and treating your tastebuds to an exquisite feast at the award-winning True South Dining Room.
location_description: The Rees Hotel, Luxury Apartments and Lakeside Residences
offer_address: 377 Frankton Road, Queenstown, Otago, 9300, New Zealand

title: Five-Star Boutique Queenstown Retreat Overlooking Lake Wakatipu
description: Whether you're cosying up by your gas fireplace or relaxing in your terrace spa, spectacular vistas of Lake Wakatipu will greet you at every turn from the five-star The Carlin Boutique Hotel. Much more than just a gateway to adventure-capital Queenstown and surrounding wine region, this hillside refuge promises exquisite attention to detail and sophistication. After days of exploration, feast on local produce at ORO restaurant, book an in-suite spa treatment (charges apply), or simply sit back with a glass of wine and drink in the views.

title: Crowne Plaza Queenstown Retreat Overlooking Lake Wakatipu & The Remarkables
description: Immerse yourself in the awe-inspiring natural beauty, vibrant dining scene, and heart-pumping adventures of Queenstown with a stay at Crowne Plaza Queenstown. With excellent amenities, the renowned Threesixty Restaurant and Bar, modern fitness centre, onsite heated storage room for skis, boards and snow gear, and service typical of the world-renowned Crowne brand, it's no surprise this hotel is a frequent TripAdvisor Travellers' Choice Award winner. Whether you’re in it for the stunning snow-capped mountains, adrenaline-fuelled bungy jumps, backcountry tracks or the most scenic vineyards in New Zealand, a stay in Queenstown will enrapture you with its thrumming activity hub, dynamic downtown restaurant scene and rugged beauty.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Queenstown, an IHG Hotel

title: Tranquil Queenstown Alpine Indulgence on Lake Wakatipu with Onsite Restaurant & Bar
description:
Experience the irresistible allure of alpine beauty at this elegant Novotel sanctuary, perfectly positioned on the serene shores of Lake Wakatipu. Enveloped by the lofty Ben Lomond and the Remarkables, breathe in the crisp, mountain air and savour breathtaking lake vistas as you unwind in the plush comforts of your thoughtfully appointed room.

When hunger strikes, head to Elements Restaurant and dine on seasonal delicacies indoors or al fresco in the Rose Garden while sipping on exquisite cocktails. For thrill-seekers looking to make the most of their escape to the Adventure Capital of the World, a visit to Skyline Gondola and bungee jumping off Kawarau Bridge should be on the bucket list.
offer_address: Corner of Earl Street and Marine Parade, Queenstown 9300, New Zealand

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Queenstown Remarkables Park Hotel
title: Contemporary Queenstown Remarkables Retreat with Upscale Restaurant & Bar
description: Stay in the heart of New Zealand's world-famous alpine playground when you stay at Holiday Inn Queenstown Remarkables Park, an IHG Hotel. Located just give minutes from Queenstown Airport, the modern hotel provides easy access to the area's best sights, including Lake Hayes, Arrowtown, Lake Wakatipu and Jack's Point Golf Course. In between explorations, indulge in gin-cured salmon, charred lamb rump or crispy pork belly at Giants Restaurant & Bar, or enjoy a glass of local wine while admiring views of the Remarkables.
location_description: Holiday Inn Queenstown Remarkables Park, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 28 Red Oaks Drive, Frankton, Queenstown 9371, New Zealand

title: Queenstown Boutique Cottage Stay on Working Vineyard with Cellar Door
description: Embrace Central Otago's beautiful natural scenery and discover New Zealand's finest wines with a stay at Kinross Cottages, a boutique property set amid lush pinot gris and pino noir vines  - just 30 minutes from Queenstown. This private, 40-acre haven of 14 generously sized rooms is ideally located for days spent exploring the verdant grounds, sampling gourmet food at the onsite bistro and fine wines at the cellar door, or simply unwinding while admiring the incredible mountain vistas.
offer_address: 2300 Gibbston Highway R.D 1 Queenstown, Otago 9371, New Zealand
